creator: TappyTaps s.r.o.
descriptionHtml:
Bibino is a reliable baby monitoring app for all modern moms, dads, and parents. 👶 Bibino turns two devices (phones, tablets, computers) into a single baby cam and is always at hand. Watch over your baby with video, and hear every sound from the child's room. Soothe your baby remotely with your voice or lullabies. With WiFi and mobile data, Bibino provides you with unlimited reach. Try Bibino now for free.

TOP FEATURES
● turn two devices into a single baby nanny cam
● hear and watch the video of your baby
● monitor with unlimited reach with WiFi and cellular data
● soothe your baby remotely with your voice
● adjust the microphone sensitivity on the baby's device to suit your needs
● stay notified about the baby
● connect with multiple parent devices
● enhance visibility with the Night Light
● access previous monitorings and replay recorded sounds
● lull your baby to sleep with a variety of lullabies and sounds

HOW BIBINO HELPS?

Hear & watch your baby
With video and audio monitoring, you can hear your baby remotely and see everything that goes on in the baby's room. With Bibino, you always have your baby under surveillance.

Unlimited reach with WiFi and mobile data
With Bibino nanny cam, you are not limited by the distance. The app works over WiFi and mobile data, which makes Bibino perfect when traveling with the baby, as each device can be connected to a different network.

Simple to set up
All you need are two devices - phones, tablets, or computers, and Bibino app. Place one device in the baby's room to monitor your little one and keep the second device with you.

Traveling with the baby
Bibino is a must-have for any parents when traveling with their babies. With Bibino, you don't need to carry extra hardware devices to monitor your baby. Bibino baby monitor is always one tap away, and with WiFi and mobile data, the app works where other baby monitors fail.

Enhance audio with Every Noise
When you're not sure what the sound you just heard was, Bibino can temporarily sensitize the audio so you can hear everything clearly.

Soothe your baby remotely
When your baby starts to wake up, you can soothe your little one back to sleep remotely with Bibino app.

Play your little one a lullaby
Choose from a variety of lullabies and soothing sounds (white noise, household sounds, and more) to lull your baby to sleep. Project a soothing image on the baby's device and control the volume and time of the lullabies remotely.

History from past monitorings
The activity log provides you with an overview history from each monitoring so you can see how long your baby was sleeping and awake. You can also replay recorded sounds from the monitoring.

Connect multiple parents' devices
With Bibino, you can monitor one Baby Station from multiple Parent Stations. This way, both parents can watch over their baby at the same time.

Stay notified
Bibino notifies you through visuals and sound when your baby is awake. The app also alerts you in case of any issues.

No hardware cameras or baby monitors
Why waste money on overpriced baby monitors with no video and with limited distance? With Bibino, you already have everything you need at home to have a baby monitor always at hand.

We value your opinion on Bibino app. Let us know how we can improve the app at support@tappytaps.com.
descriptionShort: Reliable baby monitor for all modern parents to hear, watch and soothe the baby.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Bibino app is now officially available on your Android devices. 🤩 Download Bibino now and try it for free.
Send us your feedback at support@bibinoapp.com and let us know how we should improve the app.

title: Bibino: Baby Monitor & Video Nanny Cam For Parents

creator: TappyTaps s.r.o.
descriptionHtml:
Bibino is a reliable baby monitoring app for all modern moms, dads, and parents. 👶 Bibino turns two devices (phones, tablets, computers) into a single baby cam and is always at hand. Watch over your baby with video, and hear every sound from the child's room. Soothe your baby remotely with your voice or lullabies. With WiFi and mobile data, Bibino provides you with unlimited reach. Try Bibino now for free.

TOP FEATURES
● turn two devices into a single baby nanny cam
● hear and watch the video of your baby
● monitor with unlimited reach with WiFi and cellular data
● soothe your baby remotely with your voice
● adjust the microphone sensitivity on the baby's device to suit your needs
● stay notified about the baby
● connect with multiple parent devices
● enhance visibility with the Night Light
● access previous monitorings and replay recorded sounds
● lull your baby to sleep with a variety of lullabies and sounds

HOW BIBINO HELPS?

Hear & watch your baby
With video and audio monitoring, you can hear your baby remotely and see everything that goes on in the baby's room. With Bibino, you always have your baby under surveillance.

Unlimited reach with WiFi and mobile data
With Bibino nanny cam, you are not limited by the distance. The app works over WiFi and mobile data, which makes Bibino perfect when traveling with the baby, as each device can be connected to a different network.

Simple to set up
All you need are two devices - phones, tablets, or computers, and Bibino app. Place one device in the baby's room to monitor your little one and keep the second device with you.

Traveling with the baby
Bibino is a must-have for any parents when traveling with their babies. With Bibino, you don't need to carry extra hardware devices to monitor your baby. Bibino baby monitor is always one tap away, and with WiFi and mobile data, the app works where other baby monitors fail.

Enhance audio with Every Noise
When you're not sure what the sound you just heard was, Bibino can temporarily sensitize the audio so you can hear everything clearly.

Soothe your baby remotely
When your baby starts to wake up, you can soothe your little one back to sleep remotely with Bibino app.

Play your little one a lullaby
Choose from a variety of lullabies and soothing sounds (white noise, household sounds, and more) to lull your baby to sleep. Project a soothing image on the baby's device and control the volume and time of the lullabies remotely.

History from past monitorings
The activity log provides you with an overview history from each monitoring so you can see how long your baby was sleeping and awake. You can also replay recorded sounds from the monitoring.

Connect multiple parents' devices
With Bibino, you can monitor one Baby Station from multiple Parent Stations. This way, both parents can watch over their baby at the same time.

Stay notified
Bibino notifies you through visuals and sound when your baby is awake. The app also alerts you in case of any issues.

No hardware cameras or baby monitors
Why waste money on overpriced baby monitors with no video and with limited distance? With Bibino, you already have everything you need at home to have a baby monitor always at hand.

We value your opinion on Bibino app. Let us know how we can improve the app at support@tappytaps.com.

All you need are two devices - cell phones, tablets, or computers, and Wi-Fi or LTE, 3G. Place one device in the child’s room to monitor your baby and keep the second device with you.

✈️ Traveling with the baby
Bibino is a must-have for any parents when traveling with their babies. Bibino baby video monitor is always one tap away, and with Wi-Fi, LTE, 3G, the app works where other baby monitors fail.

When you're not sure what the sound you just heard was, Bibino app can temporarily sensitize the audio so you can hear everything clearly.

🗣 Soothe your baby remotely
When your baby starts to wake up, you can soothe your child back to sleep remotely with Bibino app.

Bibino app records noises, videos, or photos from each monitoring. You can also replay recorded sounds from the monitoring and share the Activity log with another family member or a doctor to discuss your baby’s sleeping patterns and activity.

With Wi-Fi and LTE, 3G, Bibino provides you with unlimited reach.

TOP FEATURES
● turn two devices into a single video baby cam
● hear and watch the live HD video of your baby/babies
● see if your baby is calm (motion detection)
● use Bibino app for free with limited features or upgrade to Bibino Premium and access all premium features
● monitor your baby with unlimited reach with Wi-Fi and LTE, 3G
● soothe your baby remotely with your voice
● adjust the microphone sensitivity on the baby's device to suit your needs
● stay notified about the baby/babies
● connect with multiple parent & baby devices
● enhance visibility with the Night Light
● have peaceful monitoring during night with Night mode
● access previous monitorings and replay recorded sounds & videos
● lull your baby to sleep with a variety of lullabies and sounds


For some features, you need to purchase Bibino Premium (free trial available).

WHAT MAKES BIBINO THE #1 BABY MONITOR?
👀 🦻 Hear & watch your baby
With live HD video and audio monitoring, you can hear your baby remotely and see everything that goes on in the baby's room.

🌐 Unlimited reach with WiFi and mobile data
With Bibino nanny cam, parents are not limited by the distance. The app works over Wi-Fi and mobile data (LTE, 3G), which makes Bibino perfect when traveling with the baby, as each device can be connected to a different network.

✅ Easy set up
All you need are two devices - cell phones, tablets, or computers, and Wi-Fi or LTE, 3G. Place one device in the child’s room to monitor your baby and keep the second device with you.

✈️ Traveling with the baby
Bibino is a must-have for any parents when traveling with their babies. Bibino baby video monitor is always one tap away, and with Wi-Fi, LTE, 3G, the app works where other baby monitors fail.

🦻 Enhance audio with Every Noise
When you're not sure what the sound you just heard was, Bibino app can temporarily sensitize the audio so you can hear everything clearly.

🗣 Soothe your baby remotely
When your baby starts to wake up, you can soothe your child back to sleep remotely with Bibino app.

🎼 Play your little one a lullaby
Choose from a variety of lullabies and soothing sounds (white noise, household sounds, and more) to lull your baby to sleep.

⏰ History from past monitorings
Bibino app records noises, videos, or photos from each monitoring. You can also replay recorded sounds from the monitoring and share the Activity log with another family member or a doctor to discuss your baby’s sleeping patterns and activity.

📱 Monitor with multiple devices
With Bibino baby monitor, you can monitor your baby from multiple devices. Bibino also supports monitoring of multiple babies (up to 4) at the same time from one Parent Station. For clarity, you can create a child avatar and name it (Annie, Saby, Mary, Nancy, Luis, Ted, ...).

♻️ Upcycle your older phone or tablet
Reuse your older cell phone or tablet as the Baby Station and give it a new meaning. No need to purchase expensive hardware baby monitors, CCTV or IP camera when you can recycle and reuse devices you already have.

💡 Stay notified
Bibino app notifies you through visuals and sound when your baby is awake. The app also alerts you in case of any issues.

🎥 No hardware cameras or baby monitors
With Bibino, you already have everything you need at home to have a baby video monitor always at hand.

We value your opinion on Bibino app. Let us know how we can improve the app at support@tappytaps.com.

title: Bibino Baby Monitor & Baby Cam

creator: TappyTaps s.r.o.
descriptionHtml:
Bibino is a reliable baby monitoring app with great features. Bibino turns two devices (phones, tablets, computers) into a single baby video monitoring cam and is always at hand. Watch over your baby with video, and hear every sound from the child's room. Soothe your child remotely with your voice or lullabies. With Wi-Fi and LTE, 3G, Bibino provides you with unlimited reach.

TOP FEATURES
● turn two devices into a single video baby cam
● hear and watch the live HD video of your baby/babies
● see if your baby is calm (motion detection)
● use Bibino app for free with limited features or upgrade to Bibino Premium and access all premium features
● monitor your baby with unlimited reach with Wi-Fi and LTE, 3G
● soothe your baby remotely with your voice
● adjust the microphone sensitivity on the baby's device to suit your needs
● stay notified about the baby/babies
● connect with multiple parent & baby devices
● enhance visibility with the Night Light
● have peaceful monitoring during night with Night mode
● access previous monitorings and replay recorded sounds & videos
● lull your baby to sleep with a variety of lullabies and sounds


For some features, you need to purchase Bibino Premium (free trial available).

WHAT MAKES BIBINO THE #1 BABY MONITOR?
👀 🦻 Hear & watch your baby
With live HD video and audio monitoring, you can hear your baby remotely and see everything that goes on in the baby's room.

🌐 Unlimited reach with WiFi and mobile data
With Bibino nanny cam, parents are not limited by the distance. The app works over Wi-Fi and mobile data (LTE, 3G), which makes Bibino perfect when traveling with the baby, as each device can be connected to a different network.

✅ Easy set up
All you need are two devices - cell phones, tablets, or computers, and Wi-Fi or LTE, 3G. Place one device in the child’s room to monitor your baby and keep the second device with you.

✈️ Traveling with the baby

🦻 Enhance audio with Every Noise
When you're not sure what the sound you just heard was, Bibino app can temporarily sensitize the audio so you can hear everything clearly.

🗣 Soothe your baby remotely
When your baby starts to wake up, you can soothe your child back to sleep remotely with Bibino app.

🎼 Play your little one a lullaby
Choose from a variety of lullabies and soothing sounds (white noise, household sounds, and more) to lull your baby to sleep.

⏰ History from past monitorings
Bibino app records noises, videos, or photos from each monitoring. You can also replay recorded sounds from the monitoring and share the Activity log with another family member or a doctor to discuss your baby’s sleeping patterns and activity.

📱 Monitor with multiple devices
With Bibino baby monitor, you can monitor your baby from multiple devices. Bibino also supports monitoring of multiple babies (up to 4) at the same time from one Parent Station. For clarity, you can create a child avatar and name it (Annie, Saby, Mary, Nancy, Luis, Ted, ...).

Bibino app notifies you through visuals and sound when your baby is awake. The app also alerts you in case of any issues.

With Bibino nanny cam, parents are not limited by the distance. The app works over Wi-Fi and mobile data (LTE, 3G), which makes Bibino perfect when traveling with the baby, as each device can be connected to a different network.

✅ Easy set up
All you need are two devices - cell phones, tablets, or computers, and Wi-Fi or LTE, 3G. Place one device in the child’s room to monitor your baby and keep the second device with you.

✈️ Traveling with the baby
Bibino is a must-have for any parents when traveling with their babies. Bibino baby video monitor is always one tap away, and with Wi-Fi, LTE, 3G, the app works where other baby monitors fail.

🦻 Enhance audio with Every Noise
When you're not sure what the sound you just heard was, Bibino app can temporarily sensitize the audio so you can hear everything clearly.

🗣 Soothe your baby remotely
When your baby starts to wake up, you can soothe your child back to sleep remotely with Bibino app.

🎼 Play your little one a lullaby
Choose from a variety of lullabies and soothing sounds (white noise, household sounds, and more) to lull your baby to sleep.

⏰ History from past monitorings
Bibino app records noises, videos, or photos from each monitoring. You can also replay recorded sounds from the monitoring and share the Activity log with another family member or a doctor to discuss your baby’s sleeping patterns and activity.

📱 Monitor with multiple devices
With Bibino baby monitor, you can monitor your baby from multiple devices. Bibino also supports monitoring of multiple babies (up to 4) at the same time from one Parent Station. For clarity, you can create a child avatar and name it (Annie, Saby, Mary, Nancy, Luis, Ted, ...).

Reuse your older cell phone or tablet as the Baby Station and give it a new meaning. No need to purchase expensive hardware baby monitors, CCTV or IP camera when you can recycle and reuse devices you already have.

💡 Stay notified
Bibino app notifies you through visuals and sound when your baby is awake. The app also alerts you in case of any issues.

● hear and watch the live HD video of your baby/babies
● see if your baby is calm (motion detection)
● use Bibino app for free with limited features or upgrade to Bibino Premium and access all premium features
● monitor your baby with unlimited reach with Wi-Fi and LTE, 3G
● soothe your baby remotely with your voice
● adjust the microphone sensitivity on the baby's device to suit your needs
● stay notified about the baby/babies
● connect with multiple parent & baby devices
● enhance visibility with the Night Light
● have peaceful monitoring during night with Night mode
● access previous monitorings and replay recorded sounds & videos
● lull your baby to sleep with a variety of lullabies and sounds


For some features, you need to purchase Bibino Premium (free trial available).

WHAT MAKES BIBINO THE #1 BABY MONITOR?
👀 🦻 Hear & watch your baby
With live HD video and audio monitoring, you can hear your baby remotely and see everything that goes on in the baby's room.

🌐 Unlimited reach with WiFi and mobile data
With Bibino nanny cam, parents are not limited by the distance. The app works over Wi-Fi and mobile data (LTE, 3G), which makes Bibino perfect when traveling with the baby, as each device can be connected to a different network.

✅ Easy set up
All you need are two devices - cell phones, tablets, or computers, and Wi-Fi or LTE, 3G. Place one device in the child’s room to monitor your baby and keep the second device with you.

✈️ Traveling with the baby
Bibino is a must-have for any parents when traveling with their babies. Bibino baby video monitor is always one tap away, and with Wi-Fi, LTE, 3G, the app works where other baby monitors fail.

🦻 Enhance audio with Every Noise
When you're not sure what the sound you just heard was, Bibino app can temporarily sensitize the audio so you can hear everything clearly.

🗣 Soothe your baby remotely
When your baby starts to wake up, you can soothe your child back to sleep remotely with Bibino app.

🎼 Play your little one a lullaby
Choose from a variety of lullabies and soothing sounds (white noise, household sounds, and more) to lull your baby to sleep.

⏰ History from past monitorings
Bibino app records noises, videos, or photos from each monitoring. You can also replay recorded sounds from the monitoring and share the Activity log with another family member or a doctor to discuss your baby’s sleeping patterns and activity.

📱 Monitor with multiple devices
With Bibino baby monitor, you can monitor your baby from multiple devices. Bibino also supports monitoring of multiple babies (up to 4) at the same time from one Parent Station. For clarity, you can create a child avatar and name it (Annie, Saby, Mary, Nancy, Luis, Ted, ...).

♻️ Upcycle your older phone or tablet
Reuse your older cell phone or tablet as the Baby Station and give it a new meaning. No need to purchase expensive hardware baby monitors, CCTV or IP camera when you can recycle and reuse devices you already have.

💡 Stay notified
Bibino app notifies you through visuals and sound when your baby is awake. The app also alerts you in case of any issues.

🎥 No hardware cameras or baby monitors
With Bibino, you already have everything you need at home to have a baby video monitor always at hand.
